edu.greenriver.it.cardgame

Class CardGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.greenriver.it.cardgame.CardGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlackjackGame

    public abstract class CardGame
extends java.lang.Object
    With Blackjack this is a single match between the player and dealer
    Author:
    Neal

      abstract BlackJackCard cardDeal()

      Displays Welcome message to user
      abstract void playRound()
      Plays a single hand in the game
      abstract void shuffle()
      This method will shuffle the deck of cards being used in the game You will need to use the Random class to generate random integers here
